clinical_study.brief_title: Interest of Photographs by Smartphone in Dermatology
clinical_study.official_title: Interest of the Photographs by Smartphone During the Requests of Opinion Specialized in the Department of Dermatology of the CHRU of Nancy

brief_summary.textblock: To study the diagnostic performance of the images on the smartphone compare the result of the clinical examination, all the dermatoses combined and by family of pathology (inflammatory, wound, oncology, infectious, allergology), during urgent request requests in dermatology

detailed_description.textblock:
The study is conducted in the dermatology department, for a maximum duration of 6 months. We include patients who require dermatological advice and for whom their doctor sends us photographs.
Doctors contact us by telephone, describe the symptoms and send photographs according to the secure procedure.
Patients are admitted for consultation and the diagnosis by photography is compared with the clinical diagnosis

primary_outcome.measure: sensitivity, specificity, positive and negative predictive values globally
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average 6 months
primary_outcome.description: evaluation of the diagnostic performance of the test

primary_outcome.measure: sensitivity, specificity, positive and negative predictive values stratified
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average 6 months
primary_outcome.description: stratified on the families of pathologies : infectious pathology, inflammatory dermatosis, allergology, wound, oncology

secondary_outcome.measure: Calculation of Cohen's kappa concordance between dermatologists
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average 6 months

intervention.description: to evaluate the diagnostic performance of the photographs made by Smartphone, during requests for emergency dermatological advice

study_pop.textblock: Major patients presenting with dermatitis, requiring specialized advice in dermatology at the University Hospital of Nancy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- For which our fellow doctors ask a dermatological opinion for diagnostic purposes, after clinical examination of the patient, in an emergency
- After obtaining the oral consent by the requesting doctor then informing and signing a non-opposition form during the consultation at the University Hospital of Nancy
- Affiliation to a social protection
- Doctors must have signed and sent back an ethical charter, where they undertake to send the image via MSsante, then to erase the image of the smartphone
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients under the protection of justice, tutorship or curatorship
- Doctors : lack of smartphone powerful enough to offer a quality image
